body:
Hi,

`torch.cuda.device()` is a context manager:
```
torch.cuda.set_device(0)
# On device 0
with torch.cuda.device(1):
    print("Inside device is 1")    
    # On device 1
print("Outside is still 0")
# On device 0
```
